Instruction: Place a 9-inch cast iron skillet in the oven and preheat it to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
Soak cornmeal in milk for 10 minutes.
Combine the milk and cornmeal in a small bowl and let it soak for 10 minutes.
Pouring out any excess oil, add vegetable oil to the skillet and swirl to coat; then pour the batter into the skillet.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 20 minutes. Cut into squares or wedges to serve.
